name: Goblin
description:
A small, wiry creature with green skin, sharp teeth, and a mischievous grin.
 More cunning than brave, and more annoying than deadlyâ€”unless you turn your back.

name: Orc
description:
A hulking brute with jagged armor and a thirst for blood.
 Not known for brains, but definitely for breaking bones.

name: Skeleton
description: A rattling undead warrior held together by dark magic. Empty eye sockets glow with malevolent light.
